comments.html:
Will you be sharing your Market trends presentation? I'd love to read it/watch it, it sounds very interesting.
Thanks in advance,
Network admin in Canada
comments.name: NetAdmininCanada

comments.html: Can't. We do training/workshops for a living. But I'll try to organize public (open-enrollment) version of it.
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html:
For Free or Fee?

I don't work for a Telco. I'm an Enterprise admin, but am always interested in knowing the Telco trends, especially as RFP time approaches or when I have budget to improve our network design.

Thanks,
comments.name: NetworkAdmininCanada

comments.html: It won't be free ... I have to get some revenue somewhere ;) Will post the link once we have it scheduled.
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak
